markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Drow Hunter](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1386)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Hunters seek out game to keep drow communities fed and functioning.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 25

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 23

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 20
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Drow_DrowHunter.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 7">[Drow Hunter](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1386)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="CN" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Drow" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=51" />
<trait label="Elf" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=58" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #165: Eyes of Empty Death](/Sources.aspx?ID=81) pg. 82</row>

**Perception** +16; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Elven](/Languages.aspx?ID=4), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +14, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +14, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +15, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) +16

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +3

**Dex** +4

**Con** +2

**Int** +0

**Wis** +3

**Cha** +1
</row>

**[Light Blindness](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=22)**

**Items**
[Chain Shirt](/Armor.aspx?ID=6), _+1 [composite longbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=74)_ (20 arrows), [Longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 25 

**Fort** +15 

**Ref** +15 

**Will** +14 

+1 status to all saves vs. magic, +2 status to all saves vs. [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)
</row>

**HP** 115

**Immunities**
[sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145)

**Deft Evasion** When the hunter rolls a success on a Reflex save, they get a critical success instead.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
longsword +16 ([versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 1d8+7 slashing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
composite longbow +18 ([deadly d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Propulsive](/Traits.aspx?ID=191), [range increment 100 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 0](/Traits.aspx?ID=254), [volley 30 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=201)),
**Damage** 1d8+7 piercing

**Divine Innate Spells** DC 23
- **Cantrips (4th)**
[Dancing Lights](/Spells.aspx?ID=58)
- **2nd**
[Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59) (at will), [Faerie Fire](/Spells.aspx?ID=107) (at will)

**Hunter's Wound** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** once per round; **Prerequisites** The hunter is wielding a ranged weapon with a reload of 0; **Effect** The hunter makes two ranged Strikes against their prey. If both hit and deal damage, the target takes an additional 1d8 [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).

**Skirmish Strike** <actions string="Single Action" />  The hunter can [Step](/Actions.aspx?ID=87) and then [Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=89), or Strike and then Step.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-37" />
name: Drow Hunter

</summary>
